text: قالوا۟ ابنوا۟ له بنينا فالقوه فى الجحيم

translations.translation: They said, 'Build a pyre for him and fling him into the blaze!'
Build a pyre for him and throw him into the raging fire."
They spoke among themselves: “Build him a pyre and then throw him into the furnace.”
They said, "Let us build a fire and throw him into the flames".
They said, “Construct a building (furnace) for him, and then cast him in the blazing fire!”
They said: "Build for him a building and throw him into the blazing fire!"
They said: Build for him a furnace, then cast him into the burning fire.
They said, 'Build him a building, and cast him into the furnace!'
They said: Build for him a building and fling him in the red-hotfire.
They said, "Build a pyre for him and throw him into the blaze!"
They said. build for him a building and cast him into the flaming fire.
They said, ‘Build a structure for him and cast him into a huge fire.’
They said, "Build him a furnace, and throw him into the blazing fire!"
They said: "Build for him a building (it is said that the building was like a furnace) and throw him into the blazing fire!"
They replied: 'Build for him a building and cast him into the fire'
They said, “Build a pyre for him, and throw him into the furnace.”
They said, "Construct for him a furnace and throw him into the burning fire."
[37:97]   They said, amongst themselves: ‘Build for him a structure, then fill it with firewood and set it on fire, and when it is ablaze, then cast him into the fierce fire’.
(They said: Build for him a building) a furnace (and fling him in the red hot fire.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { قَالُواْ } أي: بعضهم حين كانوا متشاورين في كيفية قتله بعدما أقر رأيهم عليه: { ٱبْنُواْ لَهُ بُنْيَاناً فَأَلْقُوهُ فِي ٱلْجَحِيمِ } [الصافات: 97] أي: في النار المسعرة؛ حتى تنتقموا عن آلهتكم، فبنوا حائطاً من الحجر سمكه ثلاثون ذراعاً وعرضه عشرون، وملؤوه من الحطب، وأوقدوا فيه ناراً، فنفخوا فيها بالمنافخ حتى تسعرت، ثم طرحوه بالمنجنيق فيها

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: { قالوا ابْنُوا له } أي: لأجله { بُنياناً } من الحجر، طوله ثلاثون ذراعاً، وعرضه عشرون ذراعاً، { فَأَلْقُوه في الجحيم } في النار الشديدة، وقيل: كل نار بعضها فوق بعض فهو جحيم
